title: [Extension Proposal] SQLDelight

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

`SQLDelight` generates typesafe Kotlin APIs from SQL statements. This is an interesting alternative to some other frameworks/libraries because it's like a supercharged JDBC version.

Not sure how the code generated might work with Java, but since Kotlin is 100% interoperable with Java, it should work.SQLDelight generates typesafe Kotlin APIs from your SQL statements

### Repository name

quarkus-sqldelight

### Short description

SQLDelight generates typesafe Kotlin APIs from SQL statements

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/<REPOSITORY_NAME>/dev/

### Repository Topics

- database-access
- quarkus-extension
- sqldelight
- sql
